content.text:
# Draft:Century Credit Union

----
Century Credit Union is state chartered credit union headquartered in St. Louis, Missouri. It serves people across the St. Louis metro area, along with the employees of a number of different companies. Century is regulated and insured by the National Credit Union Administration. As of 2022, Century surpassed over $150,000,000 in total assets.
=History=
Century Credit Union was founded in 1954 as Local 1744 Credit Union by employees of the National Lead Company (now NL Industries) and the managing director of the Missouri Credit Union League, Bob Hood. In 1964, the credit union changed its name to Nalco Credit Union. Due to the closure of the Nalco plant it was created to serve in 1978, Nalco Credit Union began serving people in a handful of local zip codes. This would expand over time to encompass St. Louis City and County, Jefferson County, and Franklin County. In 1997, Nalco Credit Union would change its name to Century Credit Union.
=Services=
Century Credit Union offers a number of services including, but not limited to;
* Loans for homes, vehicles, students, and personal use
* Free Checking Accounts for children, teens, and adults
* Online and mobile banking
* Multiple types of savings accounts
* Visa credit cards
Membership with the credit union is restricted based on location and employment. Currently only residents of St. Louis City and County, Jefferson County, and Franklin County are able to join. Membership is also open to the employees and family members of employees of one of [https://www.centurycu.org/about/whocanjoin/ 49 different companies].
=Locations=
Century Credit Union's headquarters and largest branch is located in St. Louis County. The credit union operates a smaller branch location in Jefferson County. The credit union is also a member of the CO-OP Network, which allows its members to use roughly 5,600 branches and 30,000 ATMs that are part of the network for basic teller services.
=Awards=
In 2025, Century Credit Union won “Best Credit Union” in the Best of Jefferson County contest, a readers’ choice contest. Century Credit Union has also been a finalist in 2024 and 2025 for “Best Credit Union” in the St. Louis based A-List Readers’ Choice Awards.
